description:
Make your desktop easy on the eye, day and night.

Automatically toggle the color scheme between light and dark, switch backgrounds and run custom commands at sunset and sunrise.

Supports Night Light, Location Services, manual schedule and on-demand switch modes.

⚠️ THIS EXTENSION IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH UBUNTU 22.04, due to their decision to ship a mishmash of GNOME 41 and 42 components and their fragile patching of the appearance settings.
name: Night Theme Switcher
